lastReason: Homepage still renders only Streamlit shell/banner and browser console keeps failing websocket to /_stcore/stream, so users cannot reach interactive stock list/query UI.
lastBuildText: new fix commit 93df18b pushed; remote still serves old frontend bundle index.Drusyo5m.js, likely waiting Render deployment/platform sync
lastFixSummary: Reverted Streamlit runtime to 1.32.2 and removed aggressive websocket flags in Render start command while keeping conservative config defaults for proxy compatibility.
